üìú Verbatim Instructions:

Fluently add, subtract, multiply, and divide multi-digit decimals using the standard algorithm for each operation.

Make a buck: Object of this game is to be the first person to collect ten cards that exactly equal $1.00. Play with a complete deck of cards; Ace=$0.01, Two=$0.02, Three=$0.03, Four =$0.04...Ten=$0.10, Jack=$0.11, Queen=$0.12, King=$0.13

Shuffle the cards and deal ten cards to each player. Players then take turns drawing and discarding one card at a time until the deck of cards is depleted or a player collects exactly $1.00. This means it will involve a bit of logic and problem solving to discern which cards to keep and which to discard. The first player to collect cards that equal $1.00 wins that round and earns 1 point. If no one has $1.00 after the deck is depleted, the person closest to $1.00 without going over earns .5 of a point. The player with the most points at the end of ten rounds wins! ( game by; Math Geek Mama)

üí° üöÄ Mission Strategy: Step-by-Step

*(Use this guide to help you complete the instructions above)*

1. Setup: Ace = $0.01, Two = $0.02... Ten = $0.10, Jack = $0.11, Queen = $0.12, King = $0.13.

2. Deal 10 cards to everyone.

3. The Goal: Get a hand of cards that adds up to EXACTLY $1.00.

4. Draw one, Discard one. Do the math in your head.

5. First to $1.00 wins!
